name: The Legend of the 7 Golden Vampires
summary_text: While lecturing in China, Van Helsing agrees to help seven kung fu trained siblings reclaim their ancestral mountain village, now the domain of seven powerful vampires and their army of undead slaves.

name: The Witch in the Window
summary_text: When Simon brings his twelve-year-old son, Finn, to rural Vermont to help flip an old farmhouse, they encounter the malicious spirit of Lydia, a previous owner. And now with every repair they make, she's getting stronger.

name: Jauja
summary_text: A father and daughter journey from Denmark to an unknown desert that exists in a realm beyond the confines of civilization.

name: Take the Trash
summary_text: Jesper, top salesman at an IT company, is a bastard. Jesper gets in an accident DUI. He loses his job, his girlfriend and does community service at a recycling center and must adjust to his new surroundings and colleagues.

name: La grande guerra
summary_text: The Italian Army fought against the Austrians during World War I.

name: Happy Times
summary_text: Zhao is an aging bachelor who hasn't been lucky in love. Thinking he has finally met the woman of his dreams, Zhao leads her to believe he is wealthy and agrees to a wedding far beyond his ...                See full summary »

name: Sunshine State
summary_text: A woman and her new husband returns to her hometown roots in coastal northern Florida, and must deal with family, business, and encroaching real estate development.

name: Kammatti Paadam
summary_text: Krishnan, who has been living away from his family and friends in Mumbai, gets a call from his friend Ganga in Kerala, out of the blue. He senses danger, and leaves for Kammattipadam, where both of them grew up.

name: Jadesoturi
summary_text: Thousands of years ago in ancient China, a love struck sword hero fights against his destiny. He wants another chance to be reunited with his loved one and he gets that chance, in a far ...                See full summary »

name: All the Invisible Children
summary_text: Through the plights of seven different children, seven cruel destinies unfold, as the unknown innocents who share the same sensitivities and desires struggle for survival, understanding--and above all--love, in an apathetic grown-up world.

name: Slumber
summary_text: A sleep doctor tries to protect a family from a demon that feeds on people in their nightmares.

name: Jungle Book
summary_text: A boy raised by wild animals tries to adapt to human village life.

name: Found
summary_text: A horror-obsessed boy discovers his older brother is a serial killer.

name: Stoned
summary_text: A chronicle of the sordid life and suspicious death of Rolling Stones co-founder Brian Jones, who was found in the bottom of his swimming pool weeks after being let go from the band.

name: Empire of Passion
summary_text: A married woman and her lover murder her husband and dump his body into a well. After a while, his ghost comes to haunt them while the local gossip grows stronger.

name: Men of War
summary_text: A former Special Ops soldier leads a group of mercenaries to an island in the South China Sea: their mission is obtain the rights to the unusual treasure that the island beholds.

name: The Island
summary_text: A journalist takes his son with him to investigate pirate activity off the coast of Florida. But he gets stranded on a mysterious island--where he might not be alone.

name: The Steel Helmet
summary_text: A ragtag group of American stragglers battles against superior Communist troops in an abandoned Buddhist temple during the Korean War.

name: Here Comes the Devil
summary_text: A married couple lose their children while on a family trip near some caves in Tijuana. The kids eventually reappear without explanation, but it becomes clear that they are not who they ...                See full summary »

name: 7 Below
summary_text: A group of strangers trapped in a time warp house where a terrible event transpired exactly 100 years prior.

name: Relative Strangers
summary_text: A hip, well-dressed yuppie tracks down his biological parents, only to find that they live in a trailer park.

name: Il secondo tragico Fantozzi
summary_text: The frustrating adventures of a humble employee who spends all of his time fulfilling the wishes and desires of his bosses.

name: Monkey King: Hero Is Back
summary_text: The all-powerful Monkey King was imprisoned by the Gods for 500 years, but when a child releases him from his curse, the Monkey King must now save an innocent village from the evil Mountain Lord and his monstrous army.

name: The Spy Gone North
summary_text: In the mid-1990s, a loyal South Korean secret agent is caught in a political vortex plotted by the ruling classes of North and South Korea.

name: Rock'n Roll
summary_text: Guillaume Canet is told by a young co-star that he's no longer Rock'n' Roll and can't sell films anymore. He then tries to prove her wrong and gets help from his girlfriend, Marion Cotillard.

name: We the Animals
summary_text: Manny, Joel, and Jonah tear their way through childhood and push against the volatile love of their parents. As Manny and Joel grow into versions of their father and Ma dreams of escape, Jonah embraces an imagined world all on his own.

name: Skate Kitchen
summary_text: A teenaged skateboarder makes friends with a bunch of other skateboarding girls in New York City.

name: No Such Thing
summary_text: The story of a young journalist who journeys to Iceland to find her missing fiancé only to encounter a mythical creature. She eventually forges a relationship with the being.

name: The Reunion
summary_text: 4 half siblings stand to inherit $3,000,000 each from their dad, if they work together as family for 2 years. 3 of them go to Mexico as bounty hunters to get a bail-jumper, who's connected to the kidnapping of a billionaire.

name: Gekijô ban Naruto: Shippûden - Kizuna
summary_text: A mysterious group of ninja called the Sora-nin from the Sky Country makes a surprise attack on Konoha. This is because Konoha nearly destroyed the Sky Country during the last Shinobi World...                See full summary »

name: Mookuthi Amman
summary_text: Goddess Mookuthi Amman descends on Earth and uses a television reporter to expose fake godmen.

name: One Good Cop
summary_text: An NYPD Detective (Michael Keaton) and his struggle for justice, while taking care of his late partner's three little girls after he is killed in the line of duty.

name: Man on the Roof
summary_text: When a police inspector is murdered in hospital, the investigation led by detective Martin Beck uncovers reports of police misconduct and a possible revenge motive.

name: Requiem for a Heavyweight
summary_text: Knockout performances by Anthony Quinn, Jackie Gleason, Mickey Rooney and Julie Harris highlight this hard-hitting drama of corruption in the ring. Featuring Muhammad Ali.

name: Laid in America
summary_text: Two foreign exchange high-school students are kidnapped during their quest to get laid on their last night in America and it will be the best night of their life.

name: Yakuza Apocalypse
summary_text: In the ruthless underground world of the yakuza, no one is more legendary than boss Kamiura. Rumored to be invincible, the truth is he is a vampire-a bloodsucking yakuza vampire boss! Among...                See full summary »

name: The Longshots
summary_text: The true story of Jasmine Plummer who, at the age of eleven, became the first female to play in Pop Warner football tournament in its 56-year history.

name: The 5,000 Fingers of Dr. T.
summary_text: A young boy dreams that he is in an imaginary world where, assisted by his family's plumber, he must save other piano-playing kids like himself from the dungeons of his dictatorial piano teacher who also mind-controls his mother.

name: Los Parecidos
summary_text: On the rainy night of October 2, 1968, eight characters waiting on a remote bus station for a bus heading to Mexico City start experiencing a strange phenomenon.

name: Tony Manero
summary_text: A man is obsessed with John Travolta's disco dancing character from Saturday Night Fever (1977).

name: Sunset
summary_text: Tom Mix and Wyatt Earp team up to solve a murder at the Academy Awards in 1929 Hollywood.

name: The Private Life of Henry VIII.
summary_text: King Henry VIII marries five more times after his divorce from his first wife Catherine of Aragon.

name: Sang sattawat
summary_text: Story about director Apichatpong Weerasethakul's parents who were both doctors, and director's memories about growing up in the hospital environment.

name: The Pentagon Wars
summary_text: Story of a cover up in the military.

name: Ek Ladki Ko Dekha Toh Aisa Laga
summary_text: The film tells the story of Sweety Chaudhary, a closeted lesbian, and her attempts to come out to her conservative and traditional family.

name: Rangoon
summary_text: Julia travels to the Indo-Burma border to perform for the troops during the World War II, on the insistence of Billimoria, her lover. She finds herself in love with Jemadar Malik, a soldier there.

name: The 10th Victim
summary_text: In the 21st Century, where a human vs. human "Big Hunt" is used as an alternative to war, a veteran huntress agrees to kill a "victim" to get a major TV sponsorship deal, but romantic entanglements between the two complicate matters.

name: Da zui xia
summary_text: A group of bandits kidnaps the governor's son and demands their imprisoned leader to be set free in exchange.

name: Dil Bole Hadippa!
summary_text: In a village where girls don't play cricket, Veera puts on a turban and beard and becomes Veer to fulfill her dreams and meets Rohan. And fun begins.

name: Sherlock Holmes in Washington
summary_text: Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson travel to Washington D.C. in order to prevent a secret document from falling into enemy hands.

name: Tapeheads
summary_text: A couple of creative losers accidently become big shots in the video music industry.

name: Welcome Mr. Marshall!
summary_text: After finding out that North American people are visiting the Spanish villages, the citizens of Villar del Río start preparing themselves to welcome them when they arrive.

name: Shaadi Ke Side Effects
summary_text: A complicated relationship develops between a man and woman after getting married and having a baby.

name: The VelociPastor
summary_text: After losing his parents, a priest travels to China, where he inherits a mysterious ability that allows him to turn into a dinosaur. At first horrified by this new power, a hooker convinces him to use it to fight crime. And ninjas.

name: Thanmathra
summary_text: Will an unexpected turn of events change Rameshan's life forever and prevent him from witnessing his dream where his son becomes a reputable IAS Officer?

name: Return of the Seven
summary_text: Two survivors of the initial Magnificent Seven outfit, Chris and Vin, recruit four new members in order to re-form the outfit and defend a few Mexican villages from attacks by vicious bandits.

name: Naam Hai Akira
summary_text: A gripping action thriller about a college girl Akira, who has grown up with the ideals of being self reliant. Her life spirals out of control when she becomes unwittingly involved in a crime involving four corrupt police officers.

name: The Resurrected
summary_text: Charles Dexter Ward's wife enlists the help of a private detective to find out what her husband is up to in a remote cabin owned by his family for centuries.

name: Journeyman
summary_text: Boxer Matty Burton suffers a serious head injury during a fight. This is the story about the impact on his marriage, his life, and his family.

name: In My Dreams
summary_text: Natalie and Nick are frustrated with their luck in romance. After tossing coins into a fountain, the two then begin dreaming about each other. But, according to fountain mythology, they only have a week to turn those dreams into reality.

name: Lulu on the Bridge
summary_text: A famous jazz saxophonist's life is forever changed after he is accidentally shot.

name: The Dunwich Horror
summary_text: Wilbur Whateley travels to the Arkham Miskatonic University to borrow the legendary Necronomicon. But, little does anyone know, Whateley isn't quite human...

name: Le voyage du ballon rouge
summary_text: A little boy and his baby-sitter inhabit the same imaginary world: through their adventures they are followed by a strange red balloon.

name: The Big Empty
summary_text: John Person is an actor with little work, and no money, who suddenly finds himself with an opportunity to make some quick cash by delivering a suitcase to the middle of nowhere.

name: Ame agaru
summary_text: During a downpour, a generous ronin and his supporting wife are stranded at a country inn. The ronin comes to the attention of a lord who wants to hire him as an instructor for his men, who treat the ronin with disrespect.

name: Bravo Two Zero
summary_text: This is the true story of the most highly decorated British patrol since the Boer war: an eight man SAS team inserted behind Iraqi lines during the Gulf War in January 1991. Their mission ...                See full summary »

name: When a Woman Ascends the Stairs
summary_text: A middle-aged bar hostess, constantly in debt, is faced with numerous social constraints and challenges posed to her by her family, customers and friends.

name: Military Wives
summary_text: With their partners away serving in Afghanistan, a group of women on the home front form a choir and quickly find themselves at the center of a media sensation and global movement.

name: Teri Meri Kahaani
summary_text: The true love between a couple in 1910, 1960 and 2012. Their love is so strong that even destiny wants to bring them together.

name: Kaena: The Prophecy
summary_text: On the distant planet Axis, Kaena, a rebellious, high-spirited teenage girl, will defy the High Priest and her people's ancestral beliefs to take a perilous journey and discover what dark secrets lie beyond the clouds.

name: A Story from Chikamatsu
summary_text: Ishun is a wealthy, but unsympathetic, master printer who has wrongly accused his wife and best employee of being lovers. To escape punishment, the accused run away together, but Ishun is certain to be ruined if word gets out.

name: The Pill
summary_text: Worried that he has gotten the free-spirited Mindy pregnant after an unprotected one-night stand, Fred feigns romantic interest and sticks by her side for twelve hours to make sure she takes both doses of the morning-after pill.

name: Fiza
summary_text: In 1993 Fiza's brother Aman disappears during the riots in Mumbai. In 1999 Fiza is tired of waiting and goes looking for him.

name: Ants in the Pants
summary_text: A late bloomer, 15-year-old Flo experiences his sexual awakening, relentlessly targeting his gorgeous classmate Leonie. Flos friends eagerly try to help him out. The only problem may be Leonies boyfriend.

name: The Invisible Man Returns
summary_text: The owner of a coal mining operation, falsely imprisoned for fratricide, takes a drug to make him invisible, despite its side effect: gradual madness.

name: Das perfekte Geheimnis
summary_text: Seven friends - three women and four men - meet for dinner. Everyone should put their cell phone on the table. No matter what message comes in - anyone can read it and listen to the phone calls. However, this leads to a lot of chaos.

name: Distant Voices, Still Lives
summary_text: The lives of an English working-class family are told out of order in a free-associative manner. The first part, "Distant Voices", focuses on the father's role in the family. The second part, "Still Lives", focuses on his children.

name: Blood Rage
summary_text: As kids, Todd is institutionalized for a murder whilst his twin goes free. 10 years later, on Thanksgiving, Todd escapes and a killing spree begins in his neighborhood.

name: The Left Handed Gun
summary_text: After his employer is murdered by rival cattlemen, a troubled and uneducated young cowboy vows revenge on the murderers.

name: Bon Cop Bad Cop 2
summary_text: A francophone S.Q. officer and an anglophone O.P.P officer reunite to investigate a large car theft ring led by an Italian mobster.

name: Non essere cattivo
summary_text: A story set in the 90s and in the outskirts of Rome to Ostia, the same places of the films of Pasolini. His characters, in the '90s, seem to belong to a world that revolves around hedonism....                See full summary »

name: Guilty
summary_text: When a college heartthrob is accused of rape by a less popular student, his girlfriend navigates various versions of the story in search of the truth.

name: The Sand
summary_text: After an all-night graduation beach party, a group of hung-over twenty-somethings awake to a beating sun, and a seemingly carnivorous beach that devours anything with a heartbeat that touches the sand.

name: Suing the Devil
summary_text: A down-and-out law student sues Satan for $8 trillion dollars. Satan appears to defend himself with seven of the greatest trial lawyers and the trial of the century begins.

name: Alone with Her
summary_text: A quiet but disturbed young man puts the life of a woman he's obsessed with under a virtual microscope when he installs hidden cameras throughout her house.

name: Welad Rizq
summary_text: Four brothers committing crimes with a promise among them to stop someday. When a deal goes south, the older brother says it's enough, but the other three disagree and recklessly do business with a wanted crime lord.

name: Mujhse Fraaandship Karoge
summary_text: Two incompatible collegians, with fake social network ids, are assigned to work together for their institute's annual celebrations.

name: Silver City
summary_text: The discovery of a corpse threatens to unravel a bumbling local politician's campaign for governor of Colorado.

name: Real Men
summary_text: A womanizing CIA agent and an insecure insurance agent are paired together to make sure a deal goes through with aliens for the future of mankind.

name: Richard Pryor: Live on the Sunset Strip
summary_text: Richard Pryor performs his stand-up comedy act on the Sunset Strip.

name: Yol Ayrimi
summary_text: He is a boss who dedicates his life to grow up the textile empire he inherited from his father and does not hesitate to follow ruthless methods for it. He decides to choose a different life after a heavy traffic accident.

name: Daglicht
summary_text: Upon learning she has an autistic brother she is convinced is unjustly behind bars for a brutal murder, a lawyer sets out to prove her sibling's innocence - only to uncover even more life-changing secrets in the process.

name: Devil's Pond
summary_text: A couple spend their honeymoon in a cabin on a small island in the middle of a forest lake. There's no power nor cellphone connection. He starts behaving strange, not letting her leave the island. She can't swim.

name: La femme infidèle
summary_text: A man begins to believe his wife is cheating on him.

name: Hedefim Sensin
summary_text: Again a cheerful comedy by Ata Demirer and Demet Akbag that takes place in the northern part of the Aegean Sea. In the story, which begins in Istanbul and continues on the island of ...                See full summary »

name: The Doorman
summary_text: A woman returns from combat and befriends a family in NYC. A gang of thieves plot to take the family's valuables, and she is all that stands between them and their lives.

name: Bobby Deerfield
summary_text: Bobby Deerfield, a famous American race car driver on the European circuit, falls in love with the enigmatic Lillian Morelli, who is terminally ill.

name: Make Mine Music
summary_text: Animation done to contemporary popular music.

name: Semum
summary_text: Director Hasan Karacadag argues that he tried to create a model of a Turkish-Islamic horror film and that he would make the world recognize this model, of which he sees "Semum" as the first...                See full summary »

name: Matti
summary_text: A ski jumper descends from winning 4 Olympic Gold Medals, to serving two years for stabbing a relative. Careers as a stripper and singer, plus five marriages, replete with allegations of ...                See full summary »

name: Hard Ticket to Hawaii
summary_text: In Hawaii, an undercover DEA agent and her civilian friend stumble upon a drug trafficking operation, and have to enlist the help of all their colleagues/friends to go after the vicious drug kingpin.

name: Kevin Hart: Irresponsible
summary_text: Stand-up comedian Kevin Hart talks about his family, travel and a year full of reckless behavior in front of a live sold-out crowd in London.

name: Matir Moina
summary_text: A family must come to grips with its culture, its faith, and the brutal political changes entering its small-town world.

name: The Old Gun
summary_text: During World War II, a peaceful French surgeon is forced to ruthlessly exterminate the Nazis because of their atrocities.

name: Babylon 5: The Legend of the Rangers: To Live and Die in Starlight
summary_text: A disgraced Ranger takes command of an old, possibly haunted, ship on an escort mission that encounters deadly peril from a new enemy civilization.

name: The Kill Team
summary_text: A young American soldier in Afghanistan is disturbed by his commanding officer's behavior and is faced with a moral dilemma.

name: Calm with Horses
summary_text: Douglas 'Arm' Armstrong has become the feared enforcer for the drug-dealing Devers family, whilst also trying to be a good father. Torn between these two families, Arm's loyalties are tested when he is asked to kill for the first time.

name: 7 días en La Habana
summary_text: A lesbian, an aspiring actor, an aspiring singer, a low-class marriage, a neighborhood community and 2 renowned directors have memorable less-than-24-hour-long experiences while living in/visiting the capital of Cuba.

name: The Devil's Arithmetic
summary_text: A 16-year-old American girl with an apathetic view towards her Jewish family history finds herself pulled through time into 1941 to a small Polish village where the Nazis have just begun their genocidal propaganda.

name: Manto
summary_text: The film is a biographical account of writer Saadat Hasan Manto's life and is set in 1940s India.

name: Top Gear: The Perfect Road Trip
summary_text: Jeremy Clarkson and Richard Hammond go on a seven-day road trip from Venice, Italy, to Pau, France, in this special episode from the BBC motoring series. Along the way the pair visit the ...                See full summary »

name: Summer Lovers
summary_text: A young American couple and a French woman engage in a threesome in the Greek Islands.

name: It Must Be Heaven
summary_text: Filmmaker Elia Suleiman travels to different cities and finds unexpected parallels to his homeland of Palestine.

name: Dum Maaro Dum
summary_text: A corrupt police officer is entrusted the task of apprehending drug-dealers.

name: 8 ½ Women
summary_text: Following the death of a mother, a father and son open up a brothel in their Genevan estate after watching 8½ (1963).

name: All About Me
summary_text: Dramatised origin story of one of Germany's most beloved contemporary comedians.

name: Da hong zha
summary_text: During World War II, five different Chinese people fight their way through Japanese Air Force attacks to protect an important military machine in Chongqing, 1940.

name: American Ninja 5
summary_text: When a scientists daughter is kidnapped, American Ninja (David Bradley), attempts to find her, but this time he teams up with a youngster he has trained in the ways of the ninja.

name: Daughter of the Wolf
summary_text: A military veteran hunts the men who kidnapped her son.

name: The After Party
summary_text: When an aspiring rapper goes viral for all the wrong reasons, he thinks his career is over. But when his best friend gets them into a wild NYC after party, he gets one more chance to make the impossible happen.

name: The Five Heartbeats
summary_text: The story of the rise and fall of an African American vocal group.

name: The Wings of Eagles
summary_text: A biography of Navy flier-turned-screenwriter Frank W. "Spig" Wead.

name: The Giant
summary_text: A story about the world's tallest man, this is an unsettling Basque-language period drama focused on sibling rivalry.

name: The Reef
summary_text: One fish must find his destiny to save his home and the love of his life from a bullying shark.

name: Gymkata
summary_text: An American gymnast travels to a foreign country to compete in a deadly game not won by anyone other than a native in more than 900 years.

name: The Sundowners
summary_text: In Australia's Outback during the early twentieth century, the impoverished Carmody family lives a nomadic life out of their wagon, but the mom and son want to settle, while the dad is against it.

name: Saheb Biwi Aur Gangster Returns
summary_text: Saheb, his wife, and a gangster who returns to take revenge.

name: 100 Bloody Acres
summary_text: Reg and Lindsay run an organic fertiliser business. They need a fresh supply of their "secret ingredient" to process through the meat grinder. Reg comes across two guys and a girl with a broken-down vehicle on their way to a music festival.

name: Breakin' 2: Electric Boogaloo
summary_text: A developer tries to bulldoze a community recreation center. The local breakdancers try to stop it.

name: Alice Adams
summary_text: A working-class girl is thwarted and embarrassed in her attempts to move up socially by her gauche family and unstable father.

name: The Confession
summary_text: Anton Ludvik, aka Gerard, is vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of Czechoslovakia. He realizes he is watched and followed. One day, he is arrested and put into jail, in solitary confinement. ...                See full summary »

name: Christmas with a View
summary_text: Secret aspirations between a failed restaurateur and a celebrity chef threaten their blossoming Christmas romance.

name: Extraterrestrial
summary_text: A man awakens in the bedroom of a one-night stand and discovers that he must remain in her building indefinitely, as the authorities deal with last night's UFO invasion. What's more, her weirdo neighbor has a huge unrequited crush on her.

name: Deli Yürek: Bumerang Cehennemi
summary_text: Yusuf Miroglu and his fiancee Zeynep goes to Diyarbakir to attend at the wedding of Cemal, who is his close friend from military service. Cemal gets killed by mysterious assassination ...                See full summary »

name: Yoddha
summary_text: Fate brings a young man from rural Kerala to be the protector of a young Lama in Nepal, who is being chased by a dangerous cult.

name: Crossing Delancey
summary_text: A Manhattan single meets a man through her Jewish grandmother's matchmaker.

name: Willard
summary_text: A social misfit uses his only friends, his pet rats, to exact revenge on his tormentors.

name: Another World
summary_text: In a post-apocalyptic future, a biological warfare program gone wrong leaves only four survivors defending themselves from "the infected" - mindless killers. As they struggle to survive and make sense of what is happening, they find another survivor, intent on revealing the truth.

name: Napszállta
summary_text: A young girl grows up to become a strong and fearless woman in Budapest before World War I.

name: Sark Bülbülü
summary_text: After goes to city in search of a job to get the money needed for marrying Hatice, Saban becomes a popular singer.

name: La Chienne
summary_text: A woman and her pimp exploit a painter for money.

name: OK Jaanu
summary_text: Adi and Tara move to Mumbai to pursue their dreams. A chance meeting sparks off a heady, no strings attached romance until their careers pull them apart. Will ambition prevail over matters of the heart?

name: Everybody Loves Somebody
summary_text: A successful and single career woman asks her co-worker to pose as her boyfriend at a family wedding back home in Mexico. Her situation gets complicated when her ex shows up at the ceremony.

name: Yummy
summary_text: An orgy of blood, violence and fun in which a young couple travel to a shabby Eastern European hospital for plastic surgery. Once there things unravel.

name: Kaalapani
summary_text: Govardhan, a doctor by profession, is wrongly accused of bombing a train and is jailed by the British in Cellular Jail, also known as Kala Pani, in the Andaman and Nicobar Islands. He witnesses the sufferings of hundreds of Indian prisoners there.

name: Thomas and the Magic Railroad
summary_text: Thomas the Tank Engine's feature film debut follows Thomas and Mr. Conductor (Alec Baldwin) as they cross between the real world and the fictional Island of Sodor, in an attempt to recover lost gold dust.

name: After the Fox
summary_text: An Italian criminal mastermind, impersonating a film director, plans to grab the loot on a beach where a bogus movie is being filmed.

name: Spell
summary_text: A man crash lands in rural Appalachia and awakens in the attic of a traditional Hoodoo practitioner. He desperately tries to break free from her dark magic and save his family from a sinister ritual before the rise of the blood moon.

name: Rear Window
summary_text: Modern remake of Rear Window in which the lead character is paralyzed and lives in a high-tech home filled with assistive technology.

name: Nadine
summary_text: In 1950s Texas, a woman trying to recover sexy photos of herself and divorce her husband witnesses a murder and uncovers corrupt land dealings.

name: The Paleface
summary_text: Calamity Jane is dispatched to find out who's smuggling rifles to the Indians, and winds up married to a hapless correspondence-school dentist as part of her cover.

name: Pocket Listing
summary_text: Double crosses, adultery, murder, mistaken identity, and revenge ensue when a mysterious power player and his sultry wife hire a disgraced Los Angeles property broker to discreetly market and sell their Malibu villa.

name: Memories of Underdevelopment
summary_text: A Cuban man cycles through his opinions and memories as the threat of foreign invasion intensifies and the rest of his family moves to Miami.

name: La source des femmes
summary_text: A comedy/drama set in a village and centered on a battle of the sexes, where women threaten to withhold sexual favors if their men refuse to fetch water from a remote well.

name: F
summary_text: A group of teachers must defend themselves from a gang of murderous youths when their school comes under siege after hours.

name: Tui shou
summary_text: All the while, Master Chu tries to find his place in the foreign American world.

name: Bliss
summary_text: A brilliant painter facing the worst creative block of her life turns to anything she can to complete her masterpiece, spiraling into a hallucinatory hellscape of drugs, sex and murder in the sleazy underbelly of Los Angeles.

name: Fallen
summary_text: Aaron is a high school jock with a promising future. But on his 18th birthday, his life forever changes when his incredible powers emerge, revealing the terrifying truth of his identity. As...                See full summary »

name: Christmas Story
summary_text: The touching story of how Santa Claus came to be Santa.

name: Being Human
summary_text: One man must learn the meaning of courage across four lifetimes centuries apart.

name: Lady for a Day
summary_text: A gangster tries to make Apple Annie, the Times Square apple seller, a lady for a day.

name: Animal World
summary_text: A man finds himself deep in debt and is coerced to board a ship that hosts a risky gambling party.

name: You're Welcome America: A Final Night With George W. Bush
summary_text: It's time for change in America--but not without a few parting words from former President George W Bush. Here's your chance to discover the man behind the myth as HBO presents Will Ferrell...                See full summary »

name: Jiang shan mei ren
summary_text: After the death of her father, a woman is forced to take over as empress and fight to save her kingdom.

name: Land of Plenty
summary_text: A drama that investigates anxiety and disillusionment in America.

name: Didier
summary_text: Jean-Pierre, a frazzled sport agent, has better things to do than to look after his friend's labrador Didier. An amazing discovery will lead him off on an amazing adventure.

name: Kokowääh 2
summary_text: Henry,his daughter Magda,his girlfriend Katharina and their newborn son live together happily,but everything starts to change when Katherina decides to live separately for a while.

name: Equinox Flower
summary_text: A businessman clashes with his elder daughter over her choice of a husband.

name: Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 1 - Ghost Pain
